title: Hand of Adam
creator_credit: Murray Grigor, Films of Scotland and Viz Ltd
brief_description: Shows the work of Robert Adam, the Scottish architect of the 18th century. His designs were mostly inspired by Ancient Rome and Greece, having studied these styles in Italy. Many examples of his fine work are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Murray Grigor, Films of Scotland and Viz Ltd
